doc.field: 20 gelatin silver prints, 11 x 14 in., of New York street scenes and structures, including the Manhattan Bridge from below, Wall Street, the Pan Am Building and Grand Central Terminal, the World Trade Center, and the Woolworth Building. Also includes a view of 42nd Street and Lexington Avenue in a snow storm. Two prints from Queens: a view of snow-covered elevated train tracks north from the Astoria Boulevard station to the Ditmars Boulevard terminal in Queens and of the number 7 subway train descending into the Queensboro Plaza station, Swingline Staplers sign visible in the distance.
